title: Enhancing App Development Practical Competencies: Designing Information Presentation Strategies for Game-Based Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in task resolution by utilizing provided linguistic knowledge before gameplay.
Learners voluntarily reproduce language rules presented in game-based activities over three times.
Learners rate their enjoyment during the learning process at 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) via post-game surveys.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
